info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 10:46PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow Tonight... Light to moderate snow is expected to persist through late tonight along the I-25 corridor, from Fountain south to Walsenburg. Visibility down to around one half mile with patchy snow covered and slippery roads can be expected under the more intense snow. Those traveling in these areas tonight should be prepared for hazardous driving conditions through early Tuesday morning.
